about.title: About Us
about.description: Tehran Charity is a non-profit organization dedicated to providing assistance to those in need. We believe in creating a community where everyone has the opportunity to thrive.

page.heroDescription: Learn more about our initiatives and how you can get involved.
page.programsDescription: Tehran Charity is committed to making a difference in our community. We offer a variety of programs and services to help those in need.
page.registrationDescription: There are many ways to get involved with Tehran Charity. You can donate, volunteer, or participate in one of our programs.

page.heroDescription: Stay up to date with the latest news and events from Tehran Charity.

cta.title: Make a Difference Today
cta.description: Your contribution can help us make a positive impact on the lives of those in need. Join us in our mission to create a better world.

footer.description: A charity organization dedicated to helping those in need.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We would love to hear from you. Please reach out with any questions or comments.
contact.formSubmitSuccess: Your message has been sent successfully. We will contact you soon.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.subtitle: Photos from our events and activities.
gallery.noGallery: No images available in the gallery at the moment.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.welcomeMessage: Welcome to the Tehran Charity portal. From here, you can track your initiatives, events, and view your impact.

Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

DefaultError.title: Oops! Something went wrong
DefaultError.message: We encountered an issue on this page. Please try refreshing or click the button below.

DashboardError.title: Dashboard Error
DashboardError.message: An error occurred within the dashboard. Please contact support or try again later.

NotFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
NotFound.message: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't seem to exist.

DefaultNotFound.title: 404 - Page Not Found
DefaultNotFound.message: Sorry, the page you were looking for could not be found.

DashboardNotFound.title: 404 - Resource Not Found
DashboardNotFound.message: The dashboard resource you requested could not be located.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn about Tehran Charity, our mission, vision, and values
about.historyPara1: Tehran Charity was founded in 2010 with the simple mission of helping those in need. What started as a small group of volunteers has grown into a thriving organization that has impacted the lives of thousands.
about.historyPara2: Over the years, we have expanded our programs and services to meet the evolving needs of our community. We are proud of our history and the positive change we have brought to the lives of so many.
about.historyPara3: We are grateful for the support of our donors and volunteers who have made our work possible. We look forward to continuing to serve our community for many years to come.
about.missionText: Our mission is to provide assistance to those in need and to create a community where everyone has the opportunity to thrive.
about.visionText: We envision a world where everyone has access to the resources and support they need to live a healthy and fulfilling life.
about.valueMasteryText: We believe in treating everyone with kindness, empathy, and respect.
about.valueRespectText: We are committed to being honest, transparent, and accountable in all that we do.
about.valueExcellenceText: We believe in the power of working together to achieve our goals.
about.valueInnovationText: We are always looking for new and creative ways to make a difference.
about.valueCooperationText: We are passionate about our work and dedicated to making a positive impact.
about.valueResponsibilityText: We are committed to being good stewards of the resources that have been entrusted to us.
about.staffDescription: Our team is made up of passionate and dedicated individuals who are committed to making a difference.
